name: Rina Saha
clinical_exam: Firm 2.5 cm mass in upper outer quadrant of right breast; axillary nodes palpable.
history: Two pregnancies, menarche at 13, menopause at 48.
family_history: Mother diagnosed with breast cancer at 55.
treatment_plan: Breast-conserving surgery, adjuvant chemotherapy and radiation, hormonal therapy (tamoxifen).
outcome: Stable disease with no recurrence at 1 year.
